thread.section_title: Innside New York Nomad - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Affordable and Stylish in NYC
thread.title_full: Affordable and Stylish in NYC - Review of Innside New York Nomad, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: macks
title: Affordable and Stylish in NYC
text:
Great location - minutes away from Times Square and the subway and rooms at the front have (just about) a view of the Empire State building.
Rooms are small and stylish in a European way - beige has been banished from this hotel!
The beds were exceptionally comfortable - normally after a transatlantic flight I struggle sleeping, but this trip I slept almost as well as at home.
Bathroom is great - it's tiny, but well equipped with good towels and toiletries. The only thing to watch out for is that frosted glass backed shower - perfect for shadow dancing to anyone else in the room (which I always find amusing).
Breakfast is great - lots of choice, friendly staff although it can get a bit crowded.
